name: Catch Before Shutdown
description:
This game was made by Furkan Koç in 24 hours for Area Of Effect Game Jam 2021.

I couldn't devote enough time to level design because I made the game by myself.

But I learned a lot while making this game. That's why I'm the winner of this Game Jam :D

Purpose of the game: When the computer gives us a signs of life (the green light), we turn on the computer by pressing the white button (starting the computer). 

Then we start the game. If we destroy all the enemies, we win the game and go to the next level. If we can't kill the enemies and the computer is down time, the game is paused and the next boot time is awaited. If you miss a unlock time, the game will reset and you will have to start over! So be careful!
Have fun!

By the way, controls are very basic, just move, jump and shoot!

And if you have any feedback, you would make me happy and improve it by commenting here!
